turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I want to order a pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir from where

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order it from dominos

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir what kind of pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a veg extravaganza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir what size

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium size pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir what type of crust

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What options I have

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sir thin crust, cheese burst

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go for thin crust

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Veg extravaganza comes with onion, pepper, pineapple, mushroom and olives

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I change olives with tomato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir what kind of cheese

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: American cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir how you like your pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like it well baked and crispy

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure sir anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me confirm you are looking for a medium size extravaganza with tomato instead of olives with American cheese and you want it well baked

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order total is $17. Can I use the same payment method as last time

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your payment is successful and your order will be ready for pickup in 25 mins

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Also your receipt will be sent to your mobile

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you sir have a nice day
